alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 7:33PM CDT until April 18 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Illinois... Illinois River at Meredosia. Illinois River at Valley City. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Meredosia. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Friday, April 15 the stage was 17.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Illinois River Meredosia 17.0 17.4 Fri 7 pm 16.8 16.5 16.2 16.0 15.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
